document.full_text: dutch chip equipment maker asml kicks off the european technology stocks first-quarter earnings season on wednesday, when it is expected to report a profit surge due to strong demand for smartchips.
document.title: chip sector bellwether asml to see strong q1
lines_and_colors: dutch chip equipment maker asml kicks off the european technology stocks first-quarter earnings season on wednesday, when it is expected to report a profit surge due to strong demand for smartchips.
